reviewText: I run this offense during the season

I've watched the first three in this series (passing won't be in my immediate future), and can't wait to queue 'em up and watch them again for a 2nd or even 3rd review.  Highly recommend to anyone considering the Double Wing!!!

Great Videos! These videos are a great way to learn the Double Wing system. Coach Marco has done an excellent job of systematically explaining his scheme.  I have purchased 4 of his Double Wing videos and I am very pleased. Each video has been extremely clear, detailed and cohesive to the topic at hand.

I gave this video five stars because David Marco goes into enough detail about the Double Wing while still keeping it simple and easy to understand. I've rented these videos and now plan to buy them. They're as good or better than a set of videos for $160. This is a very good series and I highly recommend all of the videos by David Marco.

This is a great way to start off teaching what truly makes a player a great player for any coach down the road, knowledge of locking helps win football games. And adds substances to the actual game it self instead of just utilizing the best players. Everything is broken down, I mean selecting players the rite way and seizing it through is wonderful especially when it's successful. New programs his hook all can use this DVD or download, buy it I did!

I have been running the Double Wing for about 4 years and picked up this video to gain a more thorough understanding, and maybe a different angle on the offense.  I found it to be very consistent with the base materials I had built from, and had great depth of information.  It has been a great supplement.
This is a fantastic DVD if you plan on running the Double Wing. I would recommend this DVD if are looking to improve your teams offensive production next season. Great job Coach Marco!
